collection.name: col_events
collection.prototype:
SELECT E.id, E.event_date, E.name, E.event_type_name, E.event_type, E.annual, E.annual_str, 'Список поздравления' as report FROM ( SELECT OCF.id as id, to_date(date_part('day',O.Date_Occasion)||'-'||date_part('month',O.Date_Occasion)||'-'||date_part('year',O.date_occasion), 'DD-MM-YYYY') as event_date, O.name as name, 'Фиксированное по дате' as event_type_name, O.Occasion_Type as event_type, O.annual, CASE WHEN O.annual=1 THEN 'Да' ELSE 'Нет' END as annual_str
FROM Occa_Occasion O left join Occa_Occasion_Fixed OCF on OCF.id=O.id WHERE O.Occasion_Type=1
UNION
SELECT OOL.id as id, (SELECT DISTINCT Date_Occasion FROM Occa_Calendar_Occasion WHERE date_part('year',Date_Occasion)= date_part('year',O.date_occasion) AND Occasion=O.id ) as event_date, O.name as name, 'Переходящее' as event_type_name, O.Occasion_Type as event_type, O.annual, CASE WHEN O.annual=1 THEN 'Да' ELSE 'Нет' END as annual_str
FROM Occa_Occasion O join Occa_Occasion_Floated OOL on OOL.id=O.id WHERE O.Occasion_Type=3
UNION
SELECT OOC.id as id, O.Date_Occasion as event_date, O.name as name, 'Вычисляемое по дню в неделе' as event_type_name, O.Occasion_Type as event_type, O.annual, CASE WHEN O.annual=1 THEN 'Да' ELSE 'Нет' END as annual_str
FROM Occa_Occasion O join Occa_Occasion_Calculated OOC on OOC.id=O.id WHERE O.Occasion_Type=2 ) E ::from-clause
WHERE 1=1 ::where-clause
collection.counting-prototype:
SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT id as id, date_occasion as event_date, name as name, 'EventTypeName' as event_type_name, occasion_type as event_type, annual as annual from Occa_Occasion) E ::from-clause
WHERE 1=1 ::where-clause
